page.title: 04Stoke Park Survey -results 3
page.content:
HOME LIFE -MEALS Breakfast: 24% cooked 67% cold 9% no Lunch: 33% cooked 22% cold 1% no 44% packed Tea: 75% cooked 21% cold 4% no Supper: 11% cooked 45% cold 34% no
HOME LIFE -HOUSEHOLD CHORES Household chores were mainly done by: Adult male 09% Adult female 71% Shared with children 19% Others 01% Do-it-yourself and gardening were mainly done by: Adult male 60% Adult female 27% Shared with children 08% Others 05%
RELIGION In 24% of the families one or more members attended a place of worship regularly.
